General.Name: Guangdong Lifestrong Pharmacy Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Guangdong Lifestrong Pharmacy Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical products. The company produces tablets, pills, injection, mixture, granules, and other related products. It offers respiratory, pediatric, gynecology, urinary, and nutrition and healthcare category products. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Shantou, China.
